text: so Molly or what's sometimes called
ecstasy or MDMA is a drug people
describe it as sort of being like a
hallucinogen and also somewhat as a
stimulant it's a commonly abused drug
and the club scene party seems raves
electronic dance concerts a couple of
the problems that happen with the use of
Molly and ecstasy one is it's used by
people who are really unprepared for
what the effects are maybe their
experience of drug use creates of a
panic attack for them the other problem
with it is particularly in some outdoor
concerts when in the summertime is that
people can get really dehydrated and
they can you know develop cardiac
problems respiratory problems and can
really have a physical emergency Molly
will change how the brain functions and
causes some structural changes in the
brain functioning that's really true of
just about any drug even less than daily
heavy use will cause changes to the
brain so there's been some research that
suggests that even casual relatively
controlled use of marijuana causes some
changes in certain parts of the brain
that you can notice on a scan even very
strong structural changes in the brain
may resolve themselves if someone
completely stops using after three
months the brain may return to to its
its prior state
